articles.title: Analogue Pocket Begins Shipping In Mid-December - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Emails have been sent to those that preordered.
articles.content:
After pushing back the release date threeseparatetimes, Analogue, Inc. has announced today that its handheld game console, the Pocket will begin shipping next month.

articles.title: BTS becomes first Asian act to win top honour at American Music Awards - The Star Online
articles.description: The septet clinched the award beating out five big names – Ariana Grande, Drake, Olivia Rodrigo, Taylor Swift and The Weeknd. –
articles.content: South Korean supergroup BTS once again rewrote K-pop history Monday (Nov 22) by becoming the first Asian act to win artiste of the year, considered the top award, at the American Music Awards (AMAs).… [+1366 chars]
